name: Hi-Tech Solutions
overview:
Hi-Tech Solutions, Ltd. operates as a system and software company. The company offers SeeCar License Plate Recognition, which detects and reads vehicle license plates for parking, access control, traffic surveillance, law enforcement, and security applications; SeeContainer Identification, which tracks and reads shipping container identification marking, and transmits the ID string to the port or gate computer; and homeland security products, including rail optical character recognition to track and trace containers for monitoring dangerous goods, integration with radiation portals for first and second line of defense systems, border crossing systems, and airport traffic screening systems. The company also offers SeeWay that identifies and tracks number plates on vehicles traveling at low to high speeds; SeeRoad, a single-lane license plate recognition system; C4, which identifies the license plate and automatically opens the gate for authorized vehicles; SeeFilm, an application for off-line processing of speed and red-light violations that were captured on film; SeeCar Dynamic Link Library, a recognition software library; SEEGATE, which recognizes the containers ID, the truck plate, and optionally the wagon/chassis numbers; SEECRANE, which automatically reads and records the container ISO code number; SEETRAIN, a container recognition system on single rail tracks for terminal portals and slow/medium speed trains; and SeePlane, a vision-based multi-lane recognition system for identifying airplane tail numbers.

Hi-Tech Solutions, Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Rishon Lezion, Israel.

funding_rounds.source_description: Hi Tech Solutions Raises $3 Million in Second Round of Financing
